name: time-stamp
description: Represents a BACnet timestamp, which can be a time, a sequence number, or a date-time value.

options.name: time
options.description: A time value as the timestamp.

options.name: sequence-number
options.description: A sequence number as the timestamp.

options.name: datetime
options.description: A date and time value as the timestamp.
